"A.P.242/2/12": "Your ability and agility... I can see why you are a Guardian."
"W-Why is an ARKS attacking you?! I'm calling for backup!"
"...You certainly have the capability. Destiny has already taken hold of you."
"However, your power... It will only... bring about despair."
"If you are to someday succumb to that despair... I will not forgive you."
"I didn't see any readings until just before they attacked, either. Did you feel any sort of presence?"

"Were they concealing themselves...? Either way,
I'm glad you're alright."
"Still, their fighting style... It didn't fall under any of the currently licensed classes."
